StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/I[path])

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalUsingDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to be searched to resolve names passed to a #using directive. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/AI[path])

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalBMIDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to be searched to resolve names passed to an import directive. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/ifcSearchDir[path])

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalModuleDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more modules to be used to resolve names passed to an import directive. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/reference[[module_name=]path])

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalHeaderUnitDependencies
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more header units to be used to resolve names passed to an import header directive. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/headerUnit[header=path])

BoolProperty.Name: ScanSourceForModuleDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Makes the build scan all c++ sources, not just module interface and header unit sources, for module and header units dependencies and build the full dependencies graph.

BoolProperty.Name: TranslateIncludes
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the compiler to translate #include directives into import directives for the available header units. (/translateInclude)

EnumProperty.Name: DebugInformationFormat
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the type of debugging information generated by the compiler. This requires compatible linker settings. (/Z7, /Zi, /ZI)

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Produces no debugging information, so compilation may be faster.

EnumValue.Name: OldStyle
EnumValue.Description: Select the type of debugging information created for your program and whether this information is kept in object (.obj) files or in a program database (PDB).

EnumValue.Name: ProgramDatabase
EnumValue.Description: Produces a program database (PDB) that contains type information and symbolic debugging information for use with the debugger. The symbolic debugging information includes the names and types of variables, as well as functions and line numbers.

EnumValue.Name: EditAndContinue
EnumValue.DisplayName: Program Database for Edit And Continue
EnumValue.Description: Produces a program database, as described above, in a format that supports the Edit and Continue feature.

BoolProperty.Name: SupportJustMyCode
BoolProperty.Description: Adds supporting code for enabling Just My Code debugging in this compilation unit. (/JMC)

EnumProperty.Name: CompileAsManaged
EnumProperty.Description: Use the .NET runtime service. This switch is incompatible with some other switches; see the documentation on the /clr family of switches for details.

EnumValue.Name: false
EnumValue.Description: No Common Language RunTime Support

EnumValue.Name: true
EnumValue.Description: Creates metadata for your application that can be consumed by other CLR applications, and allows your application to consume types and data in the metadata of other CLR components.

EnumValue.Name: Pure
EnumValue.DisplayName: Pure MSIL Common Language RunTime Support
EnumValue.Description: Produces an MSIL-only output file with no native executable code, although it can contain native types compiled to MSIL.

EnumValue.Name: Safe
EnumValue.DisplayName: Safe MSIL Common Language RunTime Support
EnumValue.Description: Produces an MSIL-only (no native executable code) and verifiable output file.

BoolProperty.Name: CompileAsWinRT
BoolProperty.Description: Consume the Windows Run Time languages extensions. (/ZW)

BoolProperty.Name: WinRTNoStdLib
BoolProperty.Description: Tells the compiler not to use default Windows.winmd. It should be passed as /FU in this case.

BoolProperty.Name: SuppressStartupBanner
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses the display of the sign-on banner when the compiler starts up and display of informational messages during compiling.

EnumProperty.Name: WarningLevel
EnumProperty.Description: Select how strict you want the compiler to be about code errors. (/W0 - /W4)

EnumValue.Name: TurnOffAllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Level 0 disables all warnings.

EnumValue.Name: Level1
EnumValue.Description: Level 1 displays severe warnings. Level 1 is the default warning level at the command line.

EnumValue.Name: Level2
EnumValue.Description: Level 2 displays all level 1 warnings and warnings less severe than level 1.

EnumValue.Name: Level3
EnumValue.Description: Level 3 displays all level 2 warnings and all other warnings recommended for production purposes.

EnumValue.Name: Level4
EnumValue.Description: Level 4 displays all level 3 warnings plus informational warnings, which in most cases can be safely ignored.

EnumValue.Name: EnableAllWarnings
EnumValue.Description: Enables all warnings, including those disabled by default.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWarningAsError
BoolProperty.Description: Treats all compiler warnings as errors. For a new project, it may be best to use /WX in all compilations; resolving all warnings will ensure the fewest possible hard-to-find code defects.

StringProperty.Name: WarningVersion
StringProperty.Description: Hide warnings introduced after a specific version of the compiler. (/Wv:xx[.yy[.zzzzz]])

EnumProperty.Name: DiagnosticsFormat
EnumProperty.Description: Enables rich diagnostics, with column information and source context in diagnostic messages.

EnumValue.Name: Caret
EnumValue.Description: Provides column information in the diagnostic message, as well as outputting the relevant line of source code with a caret indicating the offending column.

EnumValue.Name: Column
EnumValue.Description: Additionally provides the column number within the line where the diagnostic is issued, where applicable.

EnumValue.Name: Classic
EnumValue.Description: Retains the prior, concise diagnostic messages with the line number.

BoolProperty.Name: SDLCheck
BoolProperty.Description: Additional Security Development Lifecycle (SDL) recommended checks; includes enabling additional secure code generation features and enables extra security-relevant warnings as errors. (/sdl, /sdl-)

BoolProperty.Name: MultiProcessorCompilation
BoolProperty.Description: Multi-processor Compilation.

BoolProperty.Name: ForceSynchronousPDBWrites
BoolProperty.Description: Synchronous write to pdb when building in parallel.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableASAN
BoolProperty.Description: Compiles and links program with AddressSanitizer. Currently available for x86 and x64 builds.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableFuzzer
BoolProperty.Description: Compiles programs with the Fuzzer. Enable AddressSanitizer for best results. Currently available for x86 and x64 builds.

EnumProperty.Name: Optimization
EnumProperty.Description: Select option for code optimization; choose Custom to use specific optimization options. (/Od, /O1, /O2)

EnumValue.Name: Custom
EnumValue.Description: Custom optimization.

EnumValue.Name: Disabled
EnumValue.Description: Disable optimization.

EnumValue.Name: MinSpace
EnumValue.Description: Equivalent to /Og /Os /Oy /Ob2 /Gs /GF /Gy

EnumValue.Name: MaxSpeed
EnumValue.Description: Equivalent to /Og /Oi /Ot /Oy /Ob2 /Gs /GF /Gy

EnumValue.Name: Full
EnumValue.Description: Equivalent to /Og /Oi /Ot /Oy /Ob2

EnumProperty.Name: InlineFunctionExpansion
EnumProperty.Description: Select the level of inline function expansion for the build. (/Ob1, /Ob2)

EnumValue.Name: Disabled
EnumValue.Description: Disables inline expansion, which is on by default.

EnumValue.Name: OnlyExplicitInline
EnumValue.Description: Expands only functions marked as inline, __inline, __forceinline or __inline or, in a C++ member function, defined within a class declaration.

EnumValue.Name: AnySuitable
EnumValue.Description: Expands functions marked as inline or __inline and any other function that the compiler chooses (expansion occurs at the compiler's discretion, often referred to as auto-inlining).

BoolProperty.Name: IntrinsicFunctions
BoolProperty.Description: Enables intrinsic functions. Using intrinsic functions generates faster, but possibly larger, code. (/Oi)

EnumProperty.Name: FavorSizeOrSpeed
EnumProperty.Description: Whether to favor code size or code speed; 'Global Optimization' must be turned on. (/Ot, /Os)

EnumValue.Name: Size
EnumValue.Description: Favor Small Code. Minimizes the size of EXEs and DLLs by instructing the compiler to favor size over speed.

EnumValue.Name: Speed
EnumValue.Description: Favor Fast Code. Maximizes the speed of EXEs and DLLs by instructing the compiler to favor speed over size. (This is the default.)

EnumValue.Name: Neither
EnumValue.Description: No size nor speed optimization.

BoolProperty.Name: OmitFramePointers
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses creation of frame pointers on the call stack.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableFiberSafeOptimizations
BoolProperty.Description: Enables memory space optimization when using fibers and thread local storage access. (/GT)

BoolProperty.Name: WholeProgramOptimization
BoolProperty.Description: Enables cross-module optimizations by delaying code generation to link time; requires that linker option 'Link Time Code Generation' be turned on. (/GL)

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Defines a preprocessing symbols for your source file.

StringListProperty.Name: UndefinePreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor undefines. (/U[macro])

BoolProperty.Name: UndefineAllPreprocessorDefinitions
BoolProperty.Description: Undefine all previously defined preprocessor values. (/u)

BoolProperty.Name: IgnoreStandardIncludePath
BoolProperty.Description: Prevents the compiler from searching for include files in directories specified in the INCLUDE environment variables.

BoolProperty.Name: PreprocessToFile
BoolProperty.Description: Preprocesses C and C++ source files and writes the preprocessed output to a file. This option suppresses compilation, thus it does not produce an .obj file.

StringProperty.Name: PreprocessOutputPath
StringProperty.Description: Specify the output path for the preprocesser. The default location is the same as the source file(s).

BoolProperty.Name: PreprocessSuppressLineNumbers
BoolProperty.Description: Preprocess without #line directives.

BoolProperty.Name: PreprocessKeepComments
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses comment strip from source code; requires that one of the 'Preprocessing' options be set. (/C)

BoolProperty.Name: UseStandardPreprocessor
BoolProperty.Description: Use a standard conforming preprocessor (/Zc:preprocessor). Currently implied by /std:c11 and later versions. To use legacy preprocessor set this property to 'No'.

BoolProperty.Name: StringPooling
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the compiler to create a single read-only copy of identical strings in the program image and in memory during execution, resulting in smaller programs, an optimization called string pooling. /O1, /O2, and /ZI automatically set /GF option.

BoolProperty.Name: MinimalRebuild
BoolProperty.Description: Enables minimal rebuild, which determines whether C++ source files that include changed C++ class definitions (stored in header (.h) files) need to be recompiled.

EnumProperty.Name: ExceptionHandling
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the model of exception handling to be used by the compiler.

EnumValue.Name: Async
EnumValue.Description: The exception-handling model that catches asynchronous (structured) and synchronous (C++) exceptions. (/EHa)

EnumValue.Name: Sync
EnumValue.Description: The exception-handling model that catches C++ exceptions only and tells the compiler to assume that extern C functions never throw a C++ exception. (/EHsc)

EnumValue.Name: SyncCThrow
EnumValue.Description: The exception-handling model that catches C++ exceptions only and tells the compiler to assume that extern C functions do throw an exception. (/EHs)

EnumValue.Name: false
EnumValue.Description: No exception handling.

BoolProperty.Name: SmallerTypeCheck
BoolProperty.Description: Enable checking for conversion to smaller types, incompatible with any optimization type other than debug. (/RTCc)

EnumProperty.Name: BasicRuntimeChecks
EnumProperty.Description: Perform basic runtime error checks, incompatible with any optimization type other than debug. (/RTCs, /RTCu, /RTC1)

EnumValue.Name: StackFrameRuntimeCheck
EnumValue.Description: Enables stack frame run-time error checking.

EnumValue.Name: UninitializedLocalUsageCheck
EnumValue.Description: Reports when a variable is used without having been initialized.

EnumValue.Name: EnableFastChecks
EnumValue.Description: Equivalent of /RTCsu.

EnumValue.Name: Default
EnumValue.Description: Default runtime checks.

EnumProperty.Name: RuntimeLibrary
EnumProperty.Description: Specify runtime library for linking. (/MT, /MTd, /MD, /MDd)

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreaded
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the multithread, static version of the run-time library.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDebug
EnumValue.Description: Defines _DEBUG and _MT. This option also causes the compiler to place the library name LIBCMTD.lib into the .obj file so that the linker will use LIBCMTD.lib to resolve external symbols.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDLL
EnumValue.Description: Causes your application to use the multithread- and DLL-specific version of the run-time library. Defines _MT and _DLL and causes the compiler to place the library name MSVCRT.lib into the .obj file.

EnumValue.Name: MultiThreadedDebugDLL
EnumValue.Description: Defines _DEBUG, _MT, and _DLL and causes your application to use the debug multithread- and DLL-specific version of the run-time library. It also causes the compiler to place the library name MSVCRTD.lib into the .obj file.

EnumProperty.Name: StructMemberAlignment
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies 1, 2, 4, 8, or 16-byte boundaries for struct member alignment. (/Zp[num])

EnumValue.Name: 1Byte
EnumValue.Description: Packs structures on 1-byte boundaries. Same as /Zp.

EnumValue.Name: 2Bytes
EnumValue.Description: Packs structures on 2-byte boundaries.

EnumValue.Name: 4Bytes
EnumValue.Description: Packs structures on 4-byte boundaries.

EnumValue.Name: 8Bytes
EnumValue.Description: Packs structures on 8-byte boundaries (default).

EnumValue.Name: 16Bytes
EnumValue.Description: Packs structures on 16-byte boundaries.

EnumValue.Name: Default
EnumValue.Description: Default alignment settings.

EnumProperty.Name: BufferSecurityCheck
EnumProperty.Description: The Security Check helps detect stack-buffer over-runs, a common attempted attack upon a program's security. . (/GS-, /GS)

EnumValue.Name: false
EnumValue.Description: Disable Security Check. (/GS-)

EnumValue.Name: true
EnumValue.Description: Enable Security Check. (/GS)

EnumProperty.Name: ControlFlowGuard
EnumProperty.Description: Guard security check helps detect attempts to dispatch to illegal block of code. (/guard:cf)

EnumValue.Name: Guard
EnumValue.Description: Enable Security Check with Guard (/guard:cf)

BoolProperty.Name: FunctionLevelLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Allows the compiler to package individual functions in the form of packaged functions (COMDATs). Required for edit and continue to work. (/Gy)

BoolProperty.Name: EnableParallelCodeGeneration
BoolProperty.Description: Allows the compiler to generate parallel code for loops identified using #pragma loop(hint_parallel[(n)]) when optimization is enabled.

EnumProperty.Name: EnableEnhancedInstructionSet
EnumProperty.Description: Enable use of instructions found on processors that support enhanced instruction sets. If no option is specified, the compiler will use instructions found on processors that support SSE2. Use of enhanced instructions can be disabled with /arch:IA32. (/arch:SSE, /arch:SSE2, /arch:AVX, /arch:AVX2, /arch:AVX512, /arch:IA32, /arch:ARMv7VE, /arch:VFPv4, /arch:[armv8.0-armv8.8],)

EnumValue.Name: StreamingSIMDExtensions
EnumValue.Description: Streaming SIMD Extensions (X86). (/arch:SSE)

EnumValue.Name: StreamingSIMDExtensions2
EnumValue.Description: Streaming SIMD Extensions 2 (X86). (/arch:SSE2)

EnumValue.Name: AdvancedVectorExtensions
EnumValue.Description: Advanced Vector Extensions (X86/X64). (/arch:AVX)

EnumValue.Name: AdvancedVectorExtensions2
EnumValue.Description: Advanced Vector Extensions 2 (X86/X64). (/arch:AVX2)

EnumValue.Name: AdvancedVectorExtensions512
EnumValue.Description: Advanced Vector Extensions 512. (X86/X64) (/arch:AVX512)

EnumValue.Name: VirtualizationExtensions
EnumValue.Description: Virtualization Extensions (ARM). (/arch:ARMv7VE)

EnumValue.Name: ARMVFPv4Instructions
EnumValue.Description: ARM VFPv4 instructions (ARM). (/arch:VFPv4)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv80
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.0-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.0)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv81
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.1-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.1)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv82
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.2-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.2)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv83
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.3-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.3)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv84
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.4-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.4)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv85
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.5-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.5)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv86
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.6-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.6)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv87
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.7-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.7)

EnumValue.Name: CPUExtensionRequirementsARMv88
EnumValue.Description: CPU extension requirements ARMv8.8-A (ARM64). (/arch:armv8.8)

EnumValue.Name: NoExtensions
EnumValue.Description: No Enhanced Instructions. (/arch:IA32)

EnumValue.Name: NotSet
EnumValue.Description: Not Set.

EnumProperty.Name: FloatingPointModel
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the floating point model. (/fp:precise, /fp:strict, /fp:fast)

EnumValue.Name: Precise
EnumValue.Description: Default. Improves the consistency of floating-point tests for equality and inequality.

EnumValue.Name: Strict
EnumValue.Description: The strictest floating-point model. /fp:strict causes fp_contract to be OFF and fenv_access to be ON. /fp:except is implied and can be disabled by explicitly specifying /fp:except-. When used with /fp:except-, /fp:strict enforces strict floating-point semantics but without respect for exceptional events.

EnumValue.Name: Fast
EnumValue.Description: Creates the fastest code in the majority of cases.

BoolProperty.Name: FloatingPointExceptions
BoolProperty.Description: Reliable floating-point exception model. Exceptions will be raised immediately after they are triggered. (/fp:except)

BoolProperty.Name: CreateHotpatchableImage
BoolProperty.Description: When hotpatching is on, the compiler ensures that first instruction of each function is two bytes, which is required for hot patching. (/hotpatch)

EnumProperty.Name: SpectreMitigation
EnumProperty.Description: Spectre mitigations for CVE 2017-5753. (/Qspectre)

EnumValue.Name: Spectre
EnumValue.Description: Enable Spectre mitigation feature for CVE 2017-5753

EnumValue.Name: SpectreLoad
EnumValue.Description: Enable Spectre mitigations for all load instructions

EnumValue.Name: SpectreLoadCF
EnumValue.Description: Enable Spectre mitigations for all control flow load instructions

EnumValue.Name: false
EnumValue.Description: Not Set.

BoolProperty.Name: IntelJCCErratum
BoolProperty.Description: Software mitigation for the performance impact caused by the Intel JCC erratum microcode update. (/QIntel-jcc-erratum)

BoolProperty.Name: GuardEHContMetadata
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a sorted list of all the valid exception handling continuation targets for a binary, used during runtime for RIP validation. Currently available for x64 builds. (/guard:ehcont)

BoolProperty.Name: GuardSignedReturns
BoolProperty.Description: Enables signed returns which help detect and prevent attempts to dispatch to illegal blocks from function returns. Currently available for ARM64 builds. (/guard:signret)

BoolProperty.Name: DisableLanguageExtensions
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses or enables language extensions. (/Za)

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWChar_tAsBuiltInType
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Treat WChar_t As Built in Type
BoolProperty.Description: When specified, the type wchar_t becomes a native type that maps to __wchar_t in the same way that short maps to __int16. /Zc:wchar_t is on by default.

BoolProperty.Name: ForceConformanceInForLoopScope
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Force Conformance in For Loop Scope
BoolProperty.Description: Used to implement standard C++ behavior for the for statement loops with Microsoft extensions (/Za, /Ze (Disable Language Extensions)). /Zc:forScope is on by default.

BoolProperty.Name: RemoveUnreferencedCodeData
BoolProperty.Description: When specified, compiler no longer generates symbol information for unreferenced code and data.

BoolProperty.Name: EnforceTypeConversionRules
BoolProperty.Description: Used to identify an rvalue reference type as the result of a cast operation in accordance with the C++11 standard.

BoolProperty.Name: RuntimeTypeInfo
BoolProperty.Description: Adds code for checking C++ object types at run time (runtime type information). (/GR, /GR-)

BoolProperty.Name: OpenMPSupport
BoolProperty.Description: Enable OpenMP 2.0 language extensions. (/openmp)

EnumProperty.Name: LanguageStandard
EnumProperty.Description: Determines the C++ language standard the compiler will enforce. It is recommended to use the latest version when possible. (/std:c++14, /std:c++17, /std:c++20, /std:c++latest)

EnumValue.Name: stdcpplatest
EnumValue.DisplayName: Preview - Features from the Latest C++ Working Draft

EnumProperty.Name: LanguageStandard_C
EnumProperty.Description: Determines the C language standard the compiler will enforce. It is recommended to use the latest version when possible. (/std:c11, /std:c17, /std:clatest)

EnumValue.Name: stdclatest
EnumValue.DisplayName: Preview - Features from the Latest C Working Draft

EnumProperty.Name: ConformanceMode
EnumProperty.Description: Enables or suppresses conformance mode. (/permissive-, /permissive).

BoolProperty.Name: EnableModules
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable Experimental C++ Standard Library Modules
BoolProperty.Description: Enables support for the experimental modules std.core, std.filesystem, std.memory, std.regex, and std.threading.

BoolProperty.Name: BuildStlModules
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Build ISO C++23 Standard Library Modules
BoolProperty.Description: Enables automatic build of std and std.compat modules when using /std:c++latest.

EnumProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeader
EnumProperty.Description: Create/Use Precompiled Header : Enables creation or use of a precompiled header during the build. (/Yc, /Yu)

EnumValue.Name: Create
EnumValue.Description: Instructs the compiler to create a precompiled header (.pch) file that represents the state of compilation at a certain point.

EnumValue.Name: Use
EnumValue.Description: Instructs the compiler to use an existing precompiled header (.pch) file in the current compilation.

EnumValue.Name: NotUsing
EnumValue.Description: Not using precompiled headers.

StringProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies header file name to use when creating or using a precompiled header file. (/Yc[name], /Yu[name])

StringProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderOutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated precompiled header file. (/Fp[name])

BoolProperty.Name: ExpandAttributedSource
BoolProperty.Description: Create listing file with expanded attributes injected into source file. (/Fx)

EnumProperty.Name: AssemblerOutput
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the contents of assembly language output file. (/FA, /FAc, /FAs, /FAcs)

EnumValue.Name: NoListing
EnumValue.Description: No listing.

EnumValue.Name: AssemblyCode
EnumValue.Description: Assembly code; .asm

EnumValue.Name: AssemblyAndMachineCode
EnumValue.Description: Machine and assembly code; .cod

EnumValue.Name: AssemblyAndSourceCode
EnumValue.Description: Source and assembly code; .asm

EnumValue.Name: All
EnumValue.Description: Assembly, machine code and source code; .cod

BoolProperty.Name: UseUnicodeForAssemblerListing
BoolProperty.Description: Causes the output file to be created in UTF-8 format.

StringProperty.Name: AssemblerListingLocation
StringProperty.Description: Specifies relative path and/or name for ASM listing file; can be file or directory name. (/Fa[name])

StringProperty.Name: ModuleOutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Module or header unit output (BMI) file location; can be file or directory name. (/ifcOutput[name])

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateModuleDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a json file containing module and header units dependencies info. (/scanDependencies)

StringProperty.Name: ModuleDependenciesFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated module dependencies file. (/scanDependencies[path])

StringProperty.Name: ObjectFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a name to override the default object file name; can be file or directory name. (/Fo[name])

StringProperty.Name: ProgramDataBaseFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a name for a compiler-generated PDB file; also specifies base name for the required compiler-generated IDB file; can be file or directory name. (/Fd[name])

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateXMLDocumentationFiles
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies that the compiler should generate XML documentation comment files (.XDC). (/doc)

StringProperty.Name: XMLDocumentationFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the name of the generated XML documentation files; can be file or directory name. (/doc[name])

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateSourceDependencies
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a json file with the list of all files the compiler used for the compilation of the source. (/sourceDependencies)

StringProperty.Name: SourceDependenciesFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated source dependencies file. (/sourceDependencies[path])

BoolProperty.Name: BrowseInformation
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies that the compiler should generate .bsc file. Note that Visual Studio doesn't use .bsc files for C++ intellisense or browsing, so it is recommended to set this property to 'No'. (/FR)

StringProperty.Name: BrowseInformationFile
StringProperty.Description: Browse File : Specifies optional name for browser information file. (/FR[name])

StringListProperty.Name: ExternalDirectoriesEnv
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more environment variables which specify directories containing external headers. Separate with ';' if more than one. (/external:env[name])

BoolProperty.Name: TreatAngleIncludeAsExternal
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Treat Files Included with Angle Brackets as External
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to treat files included with angle brackets as external. (/external:anglebrackets)

EnumProperty.Name: ExternalWarningLevel
EnumProperty.Description: Select how strict you want the compiler to be about code errors in external headers. (/external:W0 - /external:W4)

BoolProperty.Name: ExternalTemplatesDiagnostics
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to evaluate warning level across template instantiation chain. (/external:templates-)

BoolProperty.Name: DisableAnalyzeExternal
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Disable Code Analysis for External Headers
BoolProperty.Description: Disables code analysis for external headers. (/analyze:external-)

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: AnalyzeExternalRuleset
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies a code analysis ruleset override for external headers. If not specified, the Code Analysis setting is used. (/analyze:external:ruleset[path])

EnumProperty.Name: CallingConvention
EnumProperty.Description: Select the default calling convention for your application (can be overridden by function). (/Gd, /Gr, /Gz, /Gv)

EnumValue.Name: Cdecl
EnumValue.Description: Specifies the __cdecl calling convention for all functions except C++ member functions and functions marked __stdcall or __fastcall.

EnumValue.Name: FastCall
EnumValue.Description: Specifies the __fastcall calling convention for all functions except C++ member sfunctions and functions marked __cdecl or __stdcall. All __fastcall functions must have prototypes.

EnumValue.Name: StdCall
EnumValue.Description: Specifies the __stdcall calling convention for all functions except C++ member functions and functions marked __cdecl or __fastcall. All __stdcall functions must have prototypes.

EnumValue.Name: VectorCall
EnumValue.Description: Specifies the __vectorcall calling convention for all functions except C++ member functions and functions marked __cdecl, __fastcall, or __stdcall. All __vectorcall functions must have prototypes.

EnumProperty.Name: CompileAs
EnumProperty.Description: Select compile language option for .c and .cpp files. (/TC, /TP, /interface, /internalPartition, /exportHeader)

EnumValue.Name: CompileAsC
EnumValue.Description: Compile as C Code.

EnumValue.Name: CompileAsCpp
EnumValue.Description: Compile as C++ Code.

EnumValue.Name: CompileAsCppModule
EnumValue.Description: Compile as C++ Module Interace.

EnumValue.Name: CompileAsCppModuleInternalPartition
EnumValue.DisplayName: Compile as C++ Module Internal Partition
EnumValue.Description: Compile as C++ Module Internal Partition.

EnumValue.Name: CompileAsHeaderUnit
EnumValue.Description: Compile as C++ Header Unit.

StringListProperty.Name: DisableSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Disable the desired warning numbers; put numbers in a semi-colon delimited list. (/wd[num])

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: one or more forced include files. (/FI[name])

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedUsingFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more forced #using files. (/FU[name])

BoolProperty.Name: ShowIncludes
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a list of include files with compiler output. (/showIncludes)

BoolProperty.Name: EnablePREfast
BoolProperty.Description: Enables code analysis functionality that identifies common coding defects in C/C++ code. (/analyze)

StringProperty.Name: PREfastLog
StringProperty.Description: Specific the name of the output file. (/analyze:log)

StringProperty.Name: PREfastProjectDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Specify the name of PREfast project directory root. (/analyze:projectdirectory)

StringProperty.Name: PREfastRulesetDirectories
StringProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories (separate directory names with a semicolon) that are used to search for ruleset files. (/analyze:rulesetdirectory)

StringProperty.Name: PREfastRulesetFile
StringProperty.Description: Specify the name of ruleset file to use. (/analyze:ruleset)

StringListProperty.Name: PREfastAdditionalOptions
StringListProperty.Description: Extra options to use for code analysis.

StringListProperty.Name: PREfastAdditionalPlugins
StringListProperty.Description: Extra plugins to use for code analysis. (/analyze:plugin[plugin1.dll])

BoolProperty.Name: UseFullPaths
BoolProperty.Description: Use full paths in diagnostic messages. (/FC)

BoolProperty.Name: OmitDefaultLibName
BoolProperty.Description: Do not include default library names in .obj files. (/Zl)

EnumProperty.Name: ErrorReporting
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies how internal tool errors should be reported back to Microsoft. The default in the IDE is prompt. The default from command line builds is queue. (/errorReport:[method])

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Reports about internal compiler errors will not be collected or sent to Microsoft.

EnumValue.Name: Prompt
EnumValue.Description: Prompts you to send a report when you receive an internal compiler error.

EnumValue.Name: Queue
EnumValue.Description: Queues the error report. When you log in with administrator privileges, a pop-up window is displayed and allows you to report any failures since the last time you were logged in (you will not be prompted to send reports for failures more than once every three days). queue is the default when compiling an application at the command line.

EnumValue.Name: Send
EnumValue.Description: Automatically sends reports of internal compiler errors to Microsoft. To enable this option, you must first agree to Microsoft%27s data collection policy. The first time you specify /errorReport:send on a computer, a compiler message will refer you to a website that contains Microsoft%27s data collection policy.

StringListProperty.Name: TreatSpecificWarningsAsErrors
StringListProperty.Description: Treats the specific compiler warning as an error where n is a compiler warning.
